page.title: 07Bell Ringing.
page.content: On Thursday,13 June, six of us went with Mrs. Fleming up to church to look at the bell tower.There we met Mr. Holloway who is the captain of the bells.He took in to the part of the tower where the bell ropes are and showed us how to ring the bells.We had to stand on a platform.Mr. Holloway opened the door to the spiral staircase .At first it was dark but as we got used to the dim light it was'nt as dark. When we got into the clock tower Mr. Holloway showed us part of the floor that came up for the crane to put the bells up.There are five bells.The oldest one was dated 1520. The newest bells in Woolley Church are the ones that were made in Holland in 1983.
